should

I just read the post on this littl=
e tool, so I haven't tried it yet, 
but it seems like it would be very help=
ful for mocking member objects 
created in a class. How do you refactor to =
eliminate a dependency on 
member objects. I understand how to do it with o=
bjects a class 
collaborates with, but it is a different matter when the me=
mber 
objects are "owned" by the object being tested. I guess you could 
pr=
ovide the class with a factory class it could use to create it's 
members, =
but this seems like a lot of overhead for an object that only 
needs this c=
apability for testing purposes.

I am a new java programmer, so forgive me =
if my terminology isn't 
correct. Hopefully you can understand what I am tr=
ying to say.
